json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="applicationConfigurations">

<prop type="array" name="machineArmIds">
<prop type="array" name="miscs">
<prop type="array" name="servers">
<prop type="array" name="staticContentLocations">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.applicationConfigurations" options="application-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.bindingPorts" options="binding-ports" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.certificates" options="certificates" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.connectionStrings" options="connection-strings" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.dependencies" options="dependencies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.environments" options="environments" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.errors" options="errors" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.instances" options="instances" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.jvmOptions" options="jvm-options" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.machineArmIds" options="machine-arm-ids" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.miscs" options="miscs" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.servers" options="servers" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.staticContentLocations" options="static-content-locations" group="Properties">

command.name: update
command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$springbootapps.properties.applicationConfigurations" options="application-configurations" group="Properties">
